title: 344: Texting Your Ex Your Workout Videos + Getting Bullied in the School Pickup Line
itunes:title: 344: Texting Your Ex Your Workout Videos + Getting Bullied in the School Pickup Line
description:
Today The Broads excitedly chat and laugh about singing karaoke too well, Ruth’s upcoming birthday, the new love of Jess’ life, unreasonable crushes on celebrities, ranting about Leonardo DiCaprio, Jess’ styling drama with celebs, Bekah being bullied in the school pick up line, Jess accidentally texting her ex boyfriend, tips about posting thirst photos on “close friends”, Bekah discussing what Grayston talked about in the last Bro’s episode, jealousy, and more!

 

INSTAGRAM:

Chatty Broads: instagram.com/chattybroads/

Bekah: instagram.com/bekah/

Jess: instagram.com/thebaddmom/

 

YOUTUBE CHANNEL: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:
